fn.p: Author contributions: Yang Y performed the investigation and provided resources for the case care and report; Xia M, Ying GH collected the patientâ€™s clinical data; He XL analyzed data; He QE wrote the first draft of the article; Chen JH and Yang Y reviewed and edited the article for important intellectual content.
